    B

    Budget - Class in models
    Represents a budget for a specific category in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    Budget(String, double) - Constructor for class models.Budget
    Constructs a new one-time Budget with the given category and amount.
    Budget(String, double, int) - Constructor for class models.Budget
    Constructs a new Budget with the given category, amount, and recurrence.
    BudgetControllerFactory - Class in Factory
    Factory for creating BudgetController instances for a specific user.
    BudgetControllerFactory(User) - Constructor for class Factory.BudgetControllerFactory
    Constructs a BudgetControllerFactory for the given user.
    BudgetReminder - Class in models
    Represents a budget reminder in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    BudgetReminder(String, Budget) - Constructor for class models.BudgetReminder
    Constructs a new BudgetReminder with the given message and budget.
    BudgetReminderControllerFactory - Class in Factory
    Factory for creating BudgetReminderController instances for a specific user.
    BudgetReminderControllerFactory(User) - Constructor for class Factory.BudgetReminderControllerFactory
    Constructs a BudgetReminderControllerFactory for the given user.
    BudgetReminderService - Class in service
    Service for validating and creating BudgetReminder objects in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    BudgetReminderService(UUID) - Constructor for class service.BudgetReminderService
    Constructs a BudgetReminderService for the given user ID.
    BudgetService - Class in service
    Service for validating and creating Budget objects in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    BudgetService() - Constructor for class service.BudgetService
     
    BudgetStorage - Class in storage
    Storage class for Budget objects for a specific user in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    BudgetStorage(UUID) - Constructor for class storage.BudgetStorage
    Constructs a BudgetStorage for the given user ID.
